nodes.text: The Bakisian Drift was an electrical anomaly. During the Imperial Era, a convoy owned by Twin Suns Transport Services lost a GR-75 medium transport while traversing the drift. Word then got out about the lost craft and the lucrative cargo available to anyone that could navigate the Drift, attracting hostile scavengers.

In Star Wars canon, the Bakisian Drift was first mentioned in an adventure hook in the 2020 Fantasy Flight Games Star Wars Roleplaying supplement Starships and Speeders. The Drift originated in the Star Wars Legends continuity, where it first appeared in Galaxy Guide 12: Aliens — Enemies and Allies, a 1995 supplement for Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game released by West End Games.
